text: Anthony Legendre (born October 28, 1996) is an American professional soccer player who plays as a left-back. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Legendre was born in Jacksonville and grew up in Miami and Jacksonville, where he played soccer at the local YMCA. At age twelve, he and his family emigrated to Canada, where they settled in Ottawa and Legendre began playing for local club Ottawa Royals. At age fifteen Legendre joined the Ottawa Fury academy program. ===Hamilton Wanderers=== Legendre started his career playing with New Zealand ISPS Handa Premiership side Hamilton Wanderers. ===South Hobart=== In July 2018, Legendre signed with NPL Tasmania side South Hobart and made six appearances that season. ===Tulsa Roughnecks=== On February 21, 2019 Legendre signed with USL Championship club Tulsa Roughnecks. He made his debut on March 17 of that year and made nine league appearances in total that season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Association football fullbacks Category:American soccer players Category:Soccer players from Florida Category:Soccer people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Sportspeople from Miami Category:Sportspeople from Ottawa Category:American people of Haitian descent Category:American emigrants to Canada Category:American expatriate soccer players Category:Expatriate association footballers in New Zealand Category:American expatriate sportspeople in New Zealand Category:Expatriate soccer players in Australia Category:American expatriate sportspeople in Australia Category:Ottawa Fury FC players Category:Algonquin College alumni Category:Hamilton Wanderers players Category:South Hobart FC players Category:FC Tulsa players Category:New Zealand Football Championship players Category:National Premier Leagues players Category:USL Championship players
title: Anthony Legendre
